params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

params.name: -s, --shell
params.desc: output config vars in shell format

params.name: --json
params.desc: output config vars in json format

subcommands.name: config:add
subcommands.desc: set one or more config vars

subcommands.name: config:get KEY
subcommands.desc: display a config value for an app

subcommands.name: config:remove
subcommands.desc: unset one or more config vars

subcommands.name: config:set KEY1=VALUE1 [KEY2=VALUE2 ...]
subcommands.desc: set one or more config vars

subcommands.name: config:unset KEY1 [KEY2 ...]
subcommands.desc: unset one or more config vars
